meanings.definition: A person in a position of power or authority over others.
meanings.sent1: The evil overlords ruled the kingdom with an iron fist.
meanings.sent2: The overlords of the company made all the important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The overlords decided to have a pizza party for all their subjects.
meanings.sent4: The overlords' influence loomed large over the entire land.
meanings.sent5: The image of the overlords sitting on their thrones was etched in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: A group or class of people in a dominant position.
meanings.sent1: The council of overlords met to discuss the future of the city.
meanings.sent2: The overlords of the school were the popular kids who everyone looked up to.
meanings.sent3: The overlords of the playground declared a new rule: no running allowed.
meanings.sent4: The overlords of fashion set the trends for the entire season.
meanings.sent5: The overlords' presence was felt in every corner of the town.
